featured.text: They also like to make their mounds in sunny areas, heavily infesting lawns and pastures.
Now, it has infested more than 275 million hectares in the country.

definition.zh_def: 侵擾，滋生於（某地或某物）
definition.en_def: To invade or overrun in large numbers, often causing harm or damage.
definition.example: The garden was infested with weeds that choked the flowers.
